amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the space station and provide instead $500 million for termination costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of April 23, 1997, to eliminate the bill's $2.1 billion authorization for the space station in each of fiscal years 1998 and 1999, and to authorize $500 million in FY 1998 for termination costs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 305 (Roll no. 90).
